00020 namespace pi_generator {
00021 
00022 class PiGenerator {
00023  public:
00024   explicit PiGenerator(NPP npp);
00025   ~PiGenerator();
00026 
00027   NPObject* GetScriptableObject();
00028   NPError SetWindow(NPWindow* window);
00029   bool Paint();
00030   bool quit() const {
00031     return quit_;
00032   }
00033   double pi() const {
00034     return pi_;
00035   }
00036   void* pixels() const {
00037     return context2d_.region;
00038   }
00039   int width() const {
00040     return window_ ? window_->width : 0;
00041   }
00042   int height() const {
00043     return window_ ? window_->height : 0;
00044   }
00045 
00046  private:
00047   // Create and initialize the 2D context used for drawing.
00048   void CreateContext();
00049   // Destroy the 2D drawing context.
00050   void DestroyContext();
00051   bool IsContextValid() {
00052     return device2d_ != NULL;
00053   }
00054 
00055   NPP       npp_;
00056   NPObject* scriptable_object_;  // strong reference
00057 
00058   NPWindow* window_;
00059   NPDevice* device2d_;  // The PINPAPI 2D device.
00060   NPDeviceContext2D context2d_;  // The PINPAPI 2D drawing context.
00061 
00062   bool quit_;
00063   pthread_t thread_;
00064   double pi_;
00065 
00066   static void* pi(void* param);
00067 };
